mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT TT1.name, TT1.image, TT1.price, TT1.manufacture, TT1.product_year, TT1.appearance, TT1.model, TT1.max_distance, TT1.battery_type, TT1.battery_capacity, TT1.max_speed, TT1.output FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM EVCAR ORDER BY name )T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} -1) + #{pageSize} )TT1 WHERE rnum >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} -1) + 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM EVCAR )B
